title: Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit | 25 Guided STEM Experiment Lessons | 48 Page Color Student Guide | Grades 3-6 | Ages 8+ | Play & Learn | Parents' Choice Silver Award Winner
descriptions:
**Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit**

Explore the fascinating world of electricity and magnetism with the Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit. Designed for students in grades 3-6 and suitable for ages 8 and up, this comprehensive kit offers an engaging hands-on learning experience.

**Key Features:**
- **25 Guided Experiments:** Dive into a variety of exciting experiments that cover the function of electric motors and generators, and the exploration of magnetic fields and electric current.
- **Transparent Plastic Electric Motor:** The motor's transparent design allows students to observe the workings of electricity and magnetism firsthand.
- **Battery-Powered Motor Operation:** Experience the conversion of electrical energy into mechanical energy with the battery-powered motor.
- **Hand-Crank Electric Generator:** Reconfigure the kit to generate electricity through mechanical energy, understanding the inverse relationship between motors and generators.
- **Full-Color Student Guide:** A 48-page manual in full color provides clear instructions and engaging visuals to support learning.
- **Full-Color Manual:** The 60-page manual, also in full color, offers detailed guidance and additional information for educators and parents.

**Educational Focus:**
- **STEM Learning:** This kit focuses on Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics, providing a strong foundation in these critical areas.
- **Magnetic Fields and Electric Current:** Students will gain a deeper understanding of these fundamental concepts through practical experiments.
- **Electric Motor and Generator Function:** Learn how motors convert electrical energy into mechanical energy and how generators can convert mechanical energy into electrical energy.
- **Simple Circuits and Gear Systems:** Build and experiment with simple circuits and gear systems to explore energy conversion and mechanical advantage.

**Dimensions:**
- **Height:** 13.1 inches
- **Width:** 8.9 inches
- **Depth:** 2.6 inches
- **Weight:** 1.3 pounds

**Awards:**
- Parents' Choice Silver Award

The Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit is an excellent tool for educators, parents, and young scientists eager to learn about the principles of electricity and magnetism. Ideal for classroom use or at-home exploration, this kit will inspire a love of science and a deeper understanding of the world around us.

**Grade Level:** 3-6  
**Age Range:** 8+  
**Year:** 2012

Order your Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit today and embark on an exciting journey of discovery!
